description_info.description: Chandler, Ross, Pheobe, Monica, Joey, and Rachel are sitting around the sofa in Monica's apartment. Monica has lost her credit card and everyone is helping Monica check through her credit bill. Marcel the monkey is causing trouble by humping a furniture. The monkey goes into Rachel's room and wrecks Rachel's doll.
Everyone is sitting around at Monica's apartment
Monica is checking her credit bill

qa.question: How does Monica feel after her credit card has been stolen?
What is the monkey doing to the lamp?
What is Pheobe holding in her hands?

description_info.description: Late at night, Monica is still reading through her credit bill in her living room. Rachel comes out of her room to drink water but end up sitting down with her to talk about the bill. Monica is complaining that the woman who stole her credit card is living a more complete life that her by doing and buying the thing that she could only wish for.
Monica is still on her sofa having a look at what the person who picked up her card is spending
Rachel joins Monica to discuss the bill

qa.question: What color is Monica's sleep gown?
Who is in the kitchen?
Why did Rachel come out to the kitchen?

description_info.description: Joey and Chandler are sitting on a sofa in the café. They are brain-storming about what name Joey should use as his acting name. Lacking ideas, Chandler decides to have some fun by suggesting the name "Joseph Stalin" to Joey. Joey is satisfied with the name and decides to run with it.
Joey and Chandler are at Central perks, trying to come up with Joey's acting name.
Chandler recommends a well-known dictator's name for Joey's stage name.

qa.question: What are they doing?
qa.answer: ome up with Joey's acting name
qa.wrong_answer3: Deciding where to go for a trip

qa.question: What are the women doing?

description_info.description: Monica is sitting in her kitchen. She's calling the dance class that the person who stole her credit card is enrolled to and wants to find out who the person is for herself. Rachel and Pheobe come back from the laundry room to see Monica on the phone. At first, Rachel tries to talk Monica out of the idea, however, decides to go down to the class with her. At the dance class, the three are trying out dancing moves that they are not used to. Later, Rachel and Pheobe become dance partners and Monica is left alone. She is joined by a late student who's name is also Monica.
Monica is thinking of going down to the dance class to see her credit card thief
Monica meets another Monica and is partnered with her to dance

qa.question: What is Rachel holding?
Why does Monica want to visit the dance class?
qa.answer: To see the person who has been living her life with her credit card
qa.wrong_answer2: To spend time with other people

qa.question: Who becomes partners in the dancing class?

description_info.description: Joey and Chandler are sitting on the sofa in Central Perks. Ross walks in with a sad look on his face. Ross talks about his trip to the veterinary for his monkey, Marcel, and how it needs to be in a more suitable environment. Ross is told that Marcel's natural instinct to mate will only grow more aggressive, leaving him with no choice but to give him up.
Joey, Chandler, and Ross are having a discussion in the café
Ross breaks the news that he might have to give up his monkey

qa.question: What state of mind is Ross in?
Why is Ross sad?
qa.answer: He has to give up his monkey
qa.wrong_answer1: He doesn't have enough money to raise his monkey
qa.wrong_answer2: He is fed up with his monkey
qa.wrong_answer4: He doesn't know what to do with his monkey

qa.question: Where is Ross sitting?

description_info.description: The three gather around to talk about the options. Ross mentions a few zoo names to send Marcel to. Rachel, Monica, and Pheobe come into the café to talk about the other "Monica" that they met at the dancing class. The girls are in love with the new Monica that they've just met and the boys don't understand how they even got to have lunch together.
Everyone is sitting around the sofa in Central Perks.
Ross and the boys are contemplating on which zoo to send Marcel, while the girls share the story about lunch with the newly befriended Monica.

qa.question: Which zoo does Ross state that he might send the monkey to?
Why do the girls take Monica out for lunch?
Does Rachel like the new Monica?
qa.wrong_answer4: Yes, but she is keeping her guards up

description_info.description: Rachel and the two Monicas are hanging around the kitchen at Monica's apartment. Monica shares a story of how she was thrown out of a hotel once. Monica is pasting butter on to baguettes while chatting with the group. After Rachel leaves for work, the two Monicas sit around the kitchen table and talk about an audition for the Broadway show "Cats". The new Monica suggests Monica join her for the audition.
Rachel and the two Monicas are chatting with each other at Monica and Rachel's apartment kitchen.
The three are in a very good mood and are loving each other's company

qa.question: What is Monica doing?
qa.answer: She's putting butter on to the Baguettes
qa.wrong_answer2: She is pouring coffee in to mug cups

qa.question: Where is Rachel going?
What does Monica suggest?
qa.answer: To join her for a broadway audtion
qa.wrong_answer2: To go on a date with her
qa.wrong_answer3: To attend the dancing class with her
qa.wrong_answer4: To go out for a lunch

description_info.description: Ross, Rachel, Pheobe and Chandler are sitting around the living room. Ross is reading the replied letters from various zoos and is disappointed that his monkey has not been accepted by the zoos. The monkey is behaving anxiously and humps a chair. Joey walks into the apartment, also let down, after hearing that he would be stage name "Joseph Stalin" is actually a name of a real historical figure who slaughtered masses of people.
Ross, Chandler, Rachel, and Pheobe are in the living room, going through some letters sent from various zoos
Joey walks into the apartment disappointed that he cannot use his stage name.

qa.question: What is Ross doing in the scene?
How is Joey feeling?
What is Pheobe doing?
qa.answer: She is playing a Game Boy
qa.wrong_answer1: She is playing a card game

description_info.description: Ross is having a meeting with a zoo owner, who seems to be a little sketchy. The owner asks him weird questions like how the monkey would react to other animals around and how it would cope with holding tools like blades and hammers. Ross senses something is not right with this particular owner. Soon after, Joey and Chandler run into the cafe with the news that Marcel is accepted to the San Diego zoo. Ross, Chandler, and Joey are ecstatic.
Ross is having a meeting with a stranger zoo owner
Joey and Chandler run into the café with the news that Marcel is accepted to the San Diego zoo.

qa.question: What is Ross doing at the Café?
qa.wrong_answer1: He's meeting up with an old friend

qa.question: What does Joey feel about the zoo owner?
Why are Chandler, Ross, and Joey so happy in the scene?
qa.answer: Because the monkey is off to safe hands now
qa.wrong_answer1: Because thet got rid of the monkey
qa.wrong_answer3: Because they are getting a day off
qa.wrong_answer4: Because they are selling the monkey

description_info.description: Rachel is at home doing some house chores like dusting off the kitchen table. Monica comes into the house in a clownish manner, implying that she is very drunk. Rachel is annoyed that she was not able to get a hold of Monica. Rachel is worried about Monica, as she has missed her shifts lately and that she might get laid off from her work. Monica argues that she is having real fun with the new Monica and that everything is fine. Monica receives the phone call that Monica has been arrested.
Rachel is cleaning the table in her kitchen
Monica answers the phone call that Monica has been arrested.

qa.question: What is Rachel doing in the scene?
qa.wrong_answer2: She is looking for her keys

qa.question: Where are Rachel and Monica?
Why does Monica look so shocked?
qa.answer: Because she heard the news that Monica has been arrested
qa.wrong_answer1: Because she realized how drunk she was
qa.wrong_answer2: Because she left her keys somewhere
qa.wrong_answer3: Because she had lost her wallet
qa.wrong_answer4: Because she heard the monkey is off to San Diego

description_info.description: Monica visits the correctional complex where Monica is being held captive. She tells the truth about how she is the owner of the credit card that Monica had been using. Monica is feeling uneasy on going back to her daily routine. At the dance studio, Monica is fully dressed in a dance outfit and is standing at the front door. After hesitating, she walks in and does a dance move of her style.
Monica visits Monica to the correctional complex in New York City
Monica confesses about her identity

Why is Monica arrested?
qa.wrong_answer1: She broke in to a house
qa.wrong_answer3: She was caught driving under the influence

description_info.description: Ross, Rachel, Pheobe, Chandler, and Joey are at the airport to say goodbye to Marcel the monkey. They each take turns to say they're goodbyes. Rachel gifts Marcel a monkey doll. Ross asks for a private moment with the monkey but Marcel tries to hump his leg, leaving with him with no choice but to take him away. Ross is feeling sad to see Marcel go.
Ross, Chandler, Rachel, Pheobe, and Joey are at the airport.
The group are at the airport to say goodbye to Marcel

qa.question: Where are the group at?

Joey is at an audition for a theatre production
Joey says his new stage name
